Bash(# Create Windows .ico file with multiple sizes
magick resources/icons/16x16.png resources/icons/32x32.png resources/icons/64x64.png resources/icons/128x128.png resources/icons/256x256.png resources/icon.ico)

Bash(# Create iconset directory for macOS
mkdir -p resources/icon.iconset

# Copy and rename files according to Apple's requirements
cp resources/icons/16x16.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_16x16.png
cp resources/icons/32x32.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_16x16@2x.png
cp resources/icons/32x32.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_32x32.png
cp resources/icons/64x64.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_32x32@2x.png
cp resources/icons/128x128.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_128x128.png
cp resources/icons/256x256.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_128x128@2x.png
cp resources/icons/256x256.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_256x256.png
cp resources/icons/512x512.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_256x256@2x.png
cp resources/icons/512x512.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_512x512.png
cp resources/icons/1024x1024.png resources/icon.iconset/icon_512x512@2x.png

# Create the icns file
iconutil -c icns resources/icon.iconset -o resources/icon.icns

# Clean up
rm -rf resources/icon.iconset)

Bash(# Create a 512x512 PNG for GitHub OAuth
cp resources/icons/512x512.png resources/github-oauth-logo.png

# Also create one in public directory for easy access
cp resources/icons/512x512.png public/logo-512.png

echo "‚úÖ Icons generated successfully!"
echo "üìÅ Icon locations:"
echo "  - Windows: resources/icon.ico"
echo "  - macOS: resources/icon.icns"
echo "  - Linux: resources/icons/256x256.png"
echo "  - GitHub OAuth: resources/github-oauth-logo.png")
